amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-2 to increase emergency assistance funding to agricultural producers who suffered losses from hurricanes, wildfires and other agricultural related losses in 2018.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (GA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Bishop (GA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (GA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
